response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product embodies innovation and excellence, making it an unparalleled investment. Given its unique features and high standards, we believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. Considering its significance, I am offering it to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, effort, and expertise that went into creating something truly special. We trust that you will appreciate its value and find it beneficial for your needs.", "product_price": 15000}
